subject: RE: 181449- HF 6 Vs. CGML
content: Hi All,   We agreed and booked to pay 360 000 EUR VD 23/08/2018.     Kind regards/Cordialement,       Xxxxxx Xxxxx   Xxxxxx Xxxx Xxxxxx Xxxxxxx XX 11 XXXX Xxxxxx - 11111 Xxxx   Tél. +11 (1)1 11 11 11 11 xxxxx@xxxxx.xx.xx www.Xxxxxxxx-xx.xxx         De : XXXXXXX@XXXX.xxx [mailto: XXXXXXX@XXXX.xxx] Envoyé : mercredi 22 août 2018 10:43 À : Xxxxxxxx-XXX Cc : XXXXXXX.XXXXX@XXXX.xxx Objet : 181449- HF 6 Vs. CGML     Please advise on attached margin call. Thanks & Regards, XXXXX XXXXX CGML XXXXXXX@XXXX.com Group Email: XXXXXXX@XXXX.xxx Group Tel#: +11-11-1111-1111 The information contained in this electronic message and any attachments (the \"Message\") is intended for one or more specific individuals or entities, and may be confidential, proprietary, or otherwise protected by law. If you are not the intended recipient, please notify the sender immediately, delete this Message and do not disclose, distribute, or copy it to any third party or otherwise use this Message.
